title: Did the Taliban support Trump while the scientific community supported Biden?
subtitle: The popular tweet used a shaky comparison to distinguish among candidates for the American presidency in 2020.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Before the 2020 US presidential election, the Taliban and Ko Klux Klan supported US President Donald Trump while his democratic opponent, Joe Biden, "in favour of a broad-party coalition and the New England Medical Journal."
